name: Classroom - 3
description: Supporting a Youth in Crisis - Room 1 - Check in with your classmates
hints: I should look at my books and journal to jog my memory of my passcode.
I really like reading, perhaps my pin involves the number of books I have read or plan to read.
I often updated my passcode based on the age I am turning! Did I read something about this in my journal?
The numbers 1, 5, 7, and 9 appear smudged on my phone. I think I use these numbers a lot!

In order to solve this room, you need to find and enter in your phone password. The correct answer is 7519. This is because you read 7 books last month, and are planning on reading 5 books this month. 19 represents the age when you want to achieve certain goals by.
